title: PAP TRYING TO TURN WATER INTO LUXURY ITEM FOR THE RICH?
text:
PAP TRYING TO TURN WATER INTO LUXURY ITEM FOR THE RICH?  56am 
Water price hike is normal but to increase 30% is abnormal. Normal will be 1%-5% for necessities like water. 
Water must never be a luxury. What happens when you make prices too out of reach for the ordinary Singapore household? Advertisement 
Some rich household will have good health and a better standard of living, others will just be scraping by and may suffer from renal-related diseases due to the lack of water. 
Ask any business manager or accountant, 30% increase can be only due to incompetency, greed, power, bad accounting and bad management. 
In a free market, any product with 30% price increase, consumers will choose another product. But there is no alternative. If we do not drink, we will die. 
PAP failed this time on this issue. 
Not 70 Percent
